actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to authorize reduced rate transportation for young people on a space-available basis.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to authorize reduced rate air transportation for persons between the ages of 12 and 21, inclusive, on a space-available basis.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to authorize reduced rate transportation for young people on a space-available basis.
